text: Mi Niña Bonita is the second studio album released by the Venezuelan reggaeton duo Chino & Nacho. It was released on April 6, 2010.Chino & Nacho - Mi Niña Bonita CD Details at cduniverse.com. It has 12 tracks, 2 featuring guest stars like Don Omar and Baroni. ==Track listing== {| class="wikitable" |- ! # ! Title ! Performer(s) !
